dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a realm of wonder and magic.

dialogue.speaker: Mentor Figure
dialogue.text: Ah, young one, I see you're eager to begin your journey. But first, let me tell you of the perils that lie ahead.

dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: I'm not afraid. I've been training for this my whole life.

dialogue.speaker: Mentor Figure
dialogue.text: We shall see about that. The path to greatness is never easy, and the choices you make will determine the fate of this world.
